Module lanat
Package lanat.helpRepresentation

Class LayoutItem

java.lang.Object
lanat.helpRepresentation.LayoutItem
public class LayoutItem extends Object
Represents a layout item in the help message generated by HelpFormatter. This class is essentially just a builder with some helper utilities for setting a Function that generates a String for a given Command.
See Also:
  • HelpFormatter

      Parameters:

      the new LayoutItem

    • of

      public static LayoutItem of(@NotNull @NotNull String content)
      Creates a new LayoutItem with the given String as content.
      Parameters:
      content - the content of the layout item
      Returns:
      the new LayoutItem

    • withIndent

      public LayoutItem withIndent(int indent)
      Sets the indent of the layout item. The indent is the number of indents that are added to the content of the layout item. The indent size is defined by HelpFormatter.setIndentSize(int).
      Parameters:
      indent - the indent of the layout item

    • withMarginTop

      public LayoutItem withMarginTop(int marginTop)
      Sets the margin at the top of the layout item. The margin is the number of newlines that are added before the content of the layout item.
      Parameters:
      marginTop - the size of the margin at the top of the layout item

    • withMarginBottom

      public LayoutItem withMarginBottom(int marginBottom)
      Sets the margin at the bottom of the layout item. The margin is the number of newlines that are added after the content of the layout item.
      Parameters:
      marginBottom - the size of the margin at the bottom of the layout item

    • withMargin

      public LayoutItem withMargin(int margin)
      Sets the margin at the top and bottom of the layout item. The margin is the number of newlines that are added before and after the content of the layout item.
      Parameters:
      margin - the size of the margin at the top and bottom of the layout item

    • withTitle

      public LayoutItem withTitle(String title)
      Sets the title of the layout item. The title is added before the content of the layout item. The title is not indented.

      It is shown as: 

       <title>:
    <content>
      If no content is generated, the title is not shown.
      Parameters:
      title - the title of the layout item

    • getGenerator

      @NotNull public @NotNull Function<@NotNull Command,@Nullable String> getGenerator()
      Returns the Function that generates the content of the layout item.
      Returns:
      the layout generator

    • generate

      @Nullable public @Nullable String generate(@NotNull @NotNull Command cmd)
      Generates the content of the layout item. The reason this method requires a HelpFormatter is because it provides the indent size and the parent command.
      Returns:
      the content of the layout item
